name: Don's Github Homepage
body:
### [ridetracker](https://github.com/dpb1857/ridetracker)

A Python/Django based webapp for slicing and dicing the results from PBP 2011.
See: [pbpresults.bikeaholics.org](http://pbpresults.bikeaholics.org).

Don't miss the animated playback [HERE](http://pbpresults.bikeaholics.org/histogram)!

### [synced](https://github.com/dpb1857/synced)

Not much to see here, I keep some stuff that I want to sync across my home directory on different machines; dot files, elisp, some puppet stuff.

### [donbennett](https://github.com/dpb1857/donbennett)

Puppet configuration for servers I operate.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
